mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM `clearing` AS a INNER JOIN `documentstatus` AS b ON a.`sstatusid`=b.`zid` INNER JOIN `customer` AS c ON a.`scusno`=c.`eid` INNER JOIN `car` AS d ON a.`scarno` =d.`hid`
a.ssettlementdate BETWEEN #{sj1} AND #{sj2}
AND a.ssellno LIKE concat ('%',#{ssellno},'%')
AND a.ssettlementstatus LIKE concat ('%',#{ssettlementstatus},'%')
AND c.ecustomername LIKE concat ('%',#{ecustomername},'%')
AND d.hlicenseno LIKE concat ('%',#{hlicenseno},'%')
mapper.sql: sid, ssellno, sbillstypeno, sclearingform, sstatusid, ssettlementstatus, ssettlementdate, ssettlementpeople, ssettlementmoney, sbusinesstypeno, scusno, scarno, sinsuranceno, sindemnitycompany, scompletedate, sremark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from clearing
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into clearing (sid, ssellno, sbillstypeno, sclearingform, sstatusid, ssettlementstatus, ssettlementdate, ssettlementpeople, ssettlementmoney, sbusinesstypeno, scusno, scarno, sinsuranceno, sindemnitycompany, scompletedate, sremark) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ssellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbillstypeno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sclearingform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sstatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ssettlementstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssettlementdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ssettlementpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssettlementmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sbusinesstypeno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scusno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scarno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sinsuranceno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sindemnitycompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scompletedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
